00040 typedef enum
00041 {
00042     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_OFF    = 0,  
00043     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_SEVERE = 1,  
00044     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_ERROR  = 2,  
00045     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_WARN   = 3,  
00046     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_NORMAL = 4,  
00047     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_FINE   = 5,  
00048     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_FINER  = 6,  
00049     MAMA_LOG_LEVEL_FINEST = 7   
00050 } MamaLogLevel;
